name: Design Studio Toolbox
description:
GET ACCESS


Notion is the perfect tool for design studios and agencies of all sizes. It's simple, efficient, and easy to use. With these 33 templates, you have everything you need to get started on using Notion to optimize your client project intake and management. Plus, its sharable links allow clients to keep track of progress and get an overview of your creative process. Notion makes project management a breeze and is the perfect centralized source of truth for all client communication.
